  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(String name, Calendar startDate, Calendar endDate, Double budget, Employee[] managers, String[] clientData)
      Constructs a new Project object with the specified name, start date, end date, budget, managers, and client data.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the project
      startDate - the planned start date of the project
      endDate - the planned end date of the project
      budget - the budget allocated for the project
      managers - an array of managers assigned to the project
      clientData - an array of client data associated with the project

  • Method Details

    • setActive

      public void setActive(boolean isActive)
      Set the status of the project.
      Parameters:
      isActive - a boolean value that represents if the project is active or not.

    • closeStage

      public boolean closeStage()
      Closes the active stage and starts the next one, or ends the project if the active stage is the last one.
      Returns:
      true if the stage was closed successfully, false if there are no active stages

    • registerCapsule

      public String registerCapsule(int collaboratorPos, String description, int type, String lesson)
      Registers a new capsule in the active stage.
      Parameters:
      collaboratorPos - the position of the collaborator who is registering the capsule
      description - the description of the capsule
      type - the type of the capsule
      lesson - the lesson of the capsule
      Returns:
      a message indicating whether the registration was successful or not

    • assignHashtags

      public ArrayList<String> assignHashtags(String description, String lesson)
      Assigns hashtags to a given text.
      Parameters:
      description - the description of the capsule
      lesson - the lesson of the capsule
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing the hashtags found in the text

    • approveCapsule

      public void approveCapsule(int capsulePos)
      Approves a capsule in the active stage.
      Parameters:
      capsulePos - the position of the capsule to be approved

    • publicCapsule

      public String publicCapsule(int capsulePos)
      Makes a capsule public in the active stage.
      Parameters:
      capsulePos - the position of the capsule to be made public
      Returns:
      a message indicating whether the operation was successful or not
